Uses of Package
uia.sim.events

  • Packages that use uia.sim.events 
    Package Description
    uia.sim
    The simulation core framework.
    uia.sim.events
    The default implementation of events.
  • Classes in uia.sim.events used by uia.sim 
    Class and Description
    Condition
    The abstract condition event.
    Process
    Process controller.
    Timeout
    The event gets triggered after a *delay* has passed.
    This event is automatically triggered when it is created.
  • Classes in uia.sim.events used by uia.sim.events 
    Class and Description
    Condition
    The abstract condition event.
    Interruption
    Immediately schedules an Interruption event with the given cause to be thrown into the process.
    This event is automatically triggered when it is created.
    Process
    Process controller.
